title: Bug 139648BIRT Resouce deployment issue  Wrong relative path generated.
description: Now the library explorer will show all the two libraries. <listproperty name="libraries"<structure<property name="fileName"../../birtResources/base.rptlibrary</property<property name="namespace"base</property</structure<structure<property name="fileName"../../birtResources/testlibrary.rptlibrary</property<property name="namespace"testlibrary</property</structure</listproperty
OB: Bug 139648BIRT Resouce deployment issueWrong relative path generated.Set the BIRT Resource Path using WindowsPreferenceto E:\birt\birtResources Copy base.rptlibrary, testlibrary.rptlibrary files to the above location. Open the XMLSource view of the report design.The relative paths to the library are not correct.
SR: Create a report design and add the report items from the libraries. Open the XMLSource view of the report design.The relative paths to the library are not correct.
